alert.note: Alert for Eastern Glacier, Western Toole, and Central Pondera (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Wind Warning issued February 05 at 11:55AM MST until February 07 at 10:00AM MST by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 6 PM MONDAY TO 10 AM MST TUESDAY... ...HIGH WIND WATCH NOW IN EFFECT FROM TUESDAY EVENING THROUGH WEDNESDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...For the High Wind Warning, west winds 30 to 40 mph, with gusts up to 70 mph, are expected. For the High Wind Watch, west winds 30 to 40 mph, with gusts up to 65 mph, are possible. * WHERE...Eastern Glacier, Western Toole, and Central Pondera. * WHEN...For the High Wind Warning, from 6 PM Monday to 10 AM MST Tuesday. For the High Wind Watch, from Tuesday evening through Wednesday afternoon. * IMPACTS...High winds may move loose debris, damage property and cause power outages. Travel could be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Westerly wind gusts will fall to between 45 and 55 mph from late Tuesday morning through early Tuesday evening before increasing once again Tuesday night through Wednesday afternoon.
info.instruction: People are urged to secure loose objects that could be blown around or damaged by the wind.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Glacier, Western Toole, and Central Pondera
